title: 820-00165 - does not turn on with battery connected
message:
arrived not working. It has no oxidation, it just had a short on C7434. I replaced it and the board turned back on. But if you connect the battery, the board turns on and off in a few seconds, sometimes it doesn't even turn on.

I already tested with another battery, with another DC card. Same thing!
I have the 3V42_G3H with the battery connected
I already checked the C7105 and the traces of the R/D7105
R7121/22 and R7151/52 are OK.

title: 820-00165 - does not turn on with battery connected
message: What is the exact PPBUS_G3H voltage w/ and w/o battery connected?

title: 820-00165 - does not turn on with battery connected
message:
situation has changed!
The board now turns on and a few seconds later stops, even without the battery.

When you turn on the PPBus it is staying at 8.2, when it turns off, it goes to 8.6v.

With the battery connected, the board does not turn on and the PPBus is 8.6v

title: 820-00165 - does not turn on with battery connected
message:
Make it work with charger alone first.

Try starting in SMC bypass mode.
Check resistance between pins 17/18 and 27/28 of U7100.

title: 820-00165 - does not turn on with battery connected
message:
It only gets worse! LOL

The board has stopped turning on at all. PPBus 4v. SMC bypass mode does not work.
17/18 - 3
27/28 - 20

Rebbaling SMC?

Board turning into a snowball of problems!

title: 820-00165 - does not turn on with battery connected
820-00165 - does not turn on with battery connected
message:
R7113 perfect. Pin 6 - 0v

PPBus is now floating, 8.4v, 7v, in some moments it goes to 0 and goes up again!

title: 820-00165 - does not turn on with battery connected
message:
C7140 voltage fluctuates too?
If not, replace F7140 and test again the machine.

title: 820-00165 - does not turn on with battery connected
message:
Stable C7140 at 8.6v.

replace the F7140 and turned on! \o/ I'll continue with the tests!

thank you very much!

title: 820-00165 - does not turn on with battery connected
message:
"it just had a short on C7434"
That damaged F7140.
Internal fracture of the fuse is not easy to detect with nultimeter; ohm scale, or diode mode.
It fails under high current...

title: 820-00165 - does not turn on with battery connected
message: One more to note. I tested it with continuity and I didn't suspect it.

title: 820-00165 - does not turn on with battery connected
message: I explained above the reason why this continuity check is not sufficient...
